code: import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function MoreAuthorsSection(_ref){let{authors=[]}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"mt-14 pt-12 border-t border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-700",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-serif text-2xl mb-6 text-amber-600 dark:text-amber-500",children:"Discover More Authors"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",children:authors.map((author,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{initial:{opacity:0,x:-20},whileInView:{opacity:1,x:0},transition:{duration:0.5,delay:index*0.1},viewport:{once:true},className:"flex items-center gap-4 p-4 bg-white dark:bg-slate-800 rounded-xl shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:author.avatar,alt:author.name,className:"w-16 h-16 rounded-full object-cover border-2 border-amber-500"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"font-bold text-lg",children:author.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm text-slate-500",children:["Author of \"",author.book,"\""]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",className:"text-sm text-amber-600 dark:text-amber-400 mt-1 hover:underline inline-block",children:"View Profile"})]})]},index))})]});}
